seaiceR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

draw_map()

Map of locations with colours and/or sizes

k_means()

Non-hierarchical (K-means) cluster analysis

make_everything()

Make the whole analysis for a data set

make_long()

Make wide data long

make_spatial()

Make all the maps for a data set

make_temporal()

Make temporal analysis without maps (in first part of spatial analysis)

make_wide()

Make long data wide

mann_kendall_table()

Significance of Mann-Kendall test for trend, summarized

map_cluster()

Map clusters from cluster analysis

mk_map()

Map of Mann-Kendall significance levels

mk_sig()

Count number of significant Mann-Kendall trends

theil_sen_map()

Map of Theil-Sen slopes of time trends with size of slope reflected in size of point

theil_sen_slopes()

Theil-Sen slopes of time trends for each location

theil_sen_summary()

Theil-Sen slopes of time trends for each location, summarized

time_trend_plot()

Time trend plot, with linear or lowess trend, for all locations

time_trend_single()

Time trend plot, with linear or lowess trend, for single location

ward()

Hierarchical (Ward) cluster analysis

  • All functions
